name: 2d Survival shooter
description:
This is my 2D shooter project.
Modifications:
1. Changed the Level1 and Level2 Design.

2. Changed the Level1 and Level2 Enemies.

3. Changed the Enemy script to have a boolean called rotate when Enabled

It will allow the Enemy to rotate towards player, other wise the enemy will not rotate. can be seen in the Big mob in level 1 and 2
4.level 3 has a boss with many guns!
5. main menu has a new rock music
